title: R1 Eye - Wear Watch Face
summary: R1 Eye delivers eye popping watch face to your Android Wear
description: R1 Eye is our first watch face design and we want everyone to enjoy it. There are 4 different faces to choose from plus a unique battery indicator that displays a redder eye ball if the battery is getting low.Key Features:✔ 4 Eye Popping Design to choose from✔ Toggle Sweep for smooth animation✔ Unique Battery Indicator✔ Day of the Month DisplayPlease note that this has only been tested on circle faces. Please do not leave bad rating, work with us to fix the issues and make a better quality product.
descriptionHTML:
R1 Eye is our first watch face design and we want everyone to enjoy it. There are 4 different faces to choose from plus a unique battery indicator that displays a redder eye ball if the battery is getting low.

Key Features:
✔ 4 Eye Popping Design to choose from
✔ Toggle Sweep for smooth animation
✔ Unique Battery Indicator
✔ Day of the Month Display

Please note that this has only been tested on circle faces. Please do not leave bad rating, work with us to fix the issues and make a better quality product.
comments: Nice but needs work Would be better with black background around perimeter on square watches.  The white really takes away from the effect.
Great It works, its free, its great. Never pay for watch faces.
recentChanges: - Added 2 Watch Arms to choose from
- I will add more faces and arms in the next couple of weeks :)
